Plot: Still on the run from a group of Nazi zombies, a man seeks the aid of a group of American zombie enthusiasts, and discovers new techniques for fighting the zombies.
Title: Dead Snow 2: Red vs. Dead
Writer: Stig Frode Henriksen, Vegar Hoel, Tommy Wirkola
Actors: Vegar Hoel, Ørjan Gamst, Martin Starr, Jocelyn DeBoer
tomatoConsensus: Dead Snow 2: Red vs. Dead expands the original's canvas without sacrificing any of its bloody fun, adding up to a sequel that fans of the first are bound to enjoy.
